ingredients.ingredient: ½ (12 ounce) package miniature chocolate chips

cookingTips: Use a box cake mix as a shortcut—pumpkin puree replaces some wet ingredients perfectly
Fold chocolate chips in gently to distribute evenly throughout the batter
Fill muffin cups about two-thirds full; mini muffins bake quickly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a great recipe for learning how to adapt cake mixes with seasonal ingredients. Are you interested?
